backend/main.mo: Main actor defining payroll, employee, workday, leave, payment, and salary data types and initializing ordered maps for storing all backend state.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to the new actor format by directly copying all stored maps and counters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, affected files, components, and test IDs for frontend calendar synchronization behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files used for build planning.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the frontend app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/index.ts: Contains a single React heading element for employees, likely placeholder or unused.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component managing page routing, theming, and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/BulkEntryTable.t: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/BulkLeaveDayDial: Dialog component allowing selection of a date and adding a leave day for all employees via a bulk mutation.
frontend/src/components/BulkMonthlyBankS: Dialog for bulk setting monthly bank salaries for employees, supporting month/year selection and per-employee amount entry.
frontend/src/components/BulkPaymentEntry: Table UI for entering and saving bulk employee payment records for a selected date.
frontend/src/components/DailyBulkEntryTa: Displays and edits daily work-hour entries for all employees, pre-filling saved data and allowing bulk save.
frontend/src/components/EmployeeDialog.t: Dialog for creating or editing an employee with form validation and submission to backend.
frontend/src/components/EmployeeFolderVi: Shows detailed employee info and change history with an option to open the edit dialog.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component with branding and external link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar enabling page switching and theme toggling for the app.
frontend/src/components/LeaveDayDialog.t: Dialog for adding a leave day, allowing date selection and submitting a toggleLeaveDay mutation.
Displays and manages existing leave days by year, including deletion with confirmation.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyBankSalar: Shows all employees' monthly bank salaries for a selected month/year with edit and delete options.
Form dialog to add a monthly bank salary entry with month, year, and amount validation.
Dialog to edit an existing monthly bank salary entry, updating month, year, and amount.
Manager UI for adding monthly bank salaries per employee, showing default salary info.
frontend/src/components/PaymentEditDialo: Dialog component for editing a payment record, handling form state, date parsing, and saving updated payment data.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file for a profile setup modal component.
frontend/src/components/UnauthorizedAcce: Empty placeholder file for an unauthorized access screen component.
frontend/src/components/WorkDayDialog.ts: Dialog for adding or editing a work day, validating hour inputs, formatting dates, and submitting data via mutation.
frontend/src/docs/employee-calendar-sync: Documentation explaining synchronization and cache invalidation between individual and bulk work‑day entry modes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persisted identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks and helpers for fetching and mutating employee, work‑day, leave, payment, and payroll data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, CSS variables for light/dark themes, global styles, and enhanced calendar component classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with react-query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarPage.tsx: Implements an employee work‑day calendar with month navigation, employee selection, and work‑day dialog handling.
frontend/src/pages/EmployeesPage.tsx: Displays and manages employees with search, add/edit/delete dialogs, and folder view access.
frontend/src/pages/LeavePage.tsx: Manages employee leave balances with inline editing, yearly filtering, bulk updates, and reset functionality.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Empty placeholder for the login page.
frontend/src/pages/MonthlyBankSalariesPa: Provides bulk and individual monthly salary entry dialogs plus a view of aggregated bank salary data.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentsPage.tsx: Renders the payments management UI, allowing employees’ monthly payments to be added, edited, deleted, and viewed with filtering by month, year, and employee.
frontend/src/pages/PayrollPage.tsx: Displays monthly payroll data for all or a single employee, including salary calculations, payments, and navigation between months.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend build.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state and requirements for syncing employee work‑hour entries between individual and bulk views and ensuring payroll updates accordingly.
